hero.title: Sensitive Skin is Our Specialty
hero.subtitle: Sensitive skin is the specialty of "Éclat du teint"
hero.description: We are a dermocosmetic brand specializing in sensitive/problematic skin care, recognized and trusted by international dermatology experts, and cooperating with over 2,000 specialized skin institutions worldwide.
